scripts.prepare-ts:arbitrum-one: mkdir -p src/mappings/generated && mustache config/arbitrum-one.json src/mappings/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/generated/constants.ts
scripts.prepare-all:arbitrum-one: yarn prepare-config:arbitrum-one && yarn prepare-ts:arbitrum-one && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare-ts:base: mkdir -p src/mappings/generated && mustache config/base.json src/mappings/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/generated/constants.ts
scripts.prepare-all:base: yarn prepare-config:base && yarn prepare-ts:base && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare-ts:berachain: mkdir -p src/mappings/generated && mustache config/berachain.json src/mappings/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/generated/constants.ts
scripts.prepare-all:berachain: yarn prepare-config:berachain && yarn prepare-ts:berachain && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare-ts:mantle: mkdir -p src/mappings/generated && mustache config/mantle.json src/mappings/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/generated/constants.ts
scripts.prepare-all:mantle: yarn prepare-config:mantle && yarn prepare-ts:mantle && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare-ts:polygon-zkevm: mkdir -p src/mappings/generated && mustache config/polygon-zkevm.json src/mappings/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/generated/constants.ts
scripts.prepare-all:polygon-zkevm: yarn prepare-config:polygon-zkevm && yarn prepare-ts:polygon-zkevm && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare-ts:x-layer: mkdir -p src/mappings/generated && mustache config/x-layer.json src/mappings/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/generated/constants.ts
scripts.prepare-all:x-layer: yarn prepare-config:x-layer && yarn prepare-ts:x-layer && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-one: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) && yarn prepare-all:arbitrum-one && graph deploy --version-label=$VERSION --studio dolomite-liquidator-arbitrum
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-one:ormi: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) ORMI_DEPLOY_KEY=$(cat ormi-deploy-key.txt) && yarn prepare-all:arbitrum-one && graph deploy dolomite-liquidator-arbitrum --version-label=$VERSION --node https://subgraph.api.dolomite.io/deploy --ipfs https://subgraph.api.dolomite.io/ipfs --deploy-key=$ORMI_DEPLOY_KEY
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-one:goldsky: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) && yarn build:arbitrum-one && goldsky subgraph deploy dolomite-liquidator-arbitrum/$VERSION
scripts.deploy:base: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) && yarn prepare-all:base && graph deploy --version-label=$VERSION --studio dolomite-liquidator-base
scripts.deploy:base:ormi: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) ORMI_DEPLOY_KEY=$(cat ormi-deploy-key.txt) && yarn prepare-all:base && graph deploy dolomite-liquidator-base --version-label=$VERSION --node https://subgraph.api.dolomite.io/deploy --ipfs https://subgraph.api.dolomite.io/ipfs --deploy-key=$ORMI_DEPLOY_KEY
scripts.deploy:base:goldsky: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) && yarn build:base && goldsky subgraph deploy dolomite-liquidator-base/$VERSION

scripts.deploy:berachain:goldsky: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) && yarn build:berachain && goldsky subgraph deploy dolomite-liquidator-berachain-mainnet/$VERSION
